response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value for us and has been meticulously designed to meet your specific needs. This product is not just a commodity; it's a testament to innovation and craftsmanship. Given its significance, we believe it's worth every penny of its $1,000,000 value to you. We are offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is a limited-time offer, so please consider it carefully. We look forward to discussing the details and potentially bringing this exceptional product into your possession.", "product_price": 950000}
